48 
57  class mass_based {
58 
64  template<typename Space, typename Matrix>
65  class Implementation {
66 
67  using coord_type = Space;
68  using matrix_type = Matrix;
69  using point_ID_type = quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>;
70 
71  matrix_type _matrix;
72  std::vector<point_ID_type> const& _points;
73  std::vector<coord_type> const& _coords;
74  mutable std::map<coord_type, std::vector<coord_type>> m_arrival_space_cash;
75 
76  template<typename F>
77  matrix_type make_matrix(std::vector<coord_type> const& coords, F f){
78  matrix_type A (coords.size(), coords.size());
79  for (unsigned i = 0; i < A.size1 (); ++ i)
80  {
81  for (unsigned j = 0; j < A.size2(); ++ j)
82  {
83  auto x = coords.at(i);
84  auto y = coords.at(j);
85  A (i, j) = f(x, y);
86  }
87  }
88  return quetzal::utils::divide_terms_by_row_sum(A);
89  }
90 
91  public:
92 
93  // Forbid costly copy
94  Implementation(const Implementation&) = delete;
95 
96  template<typename F>
97  Implementation(std::vector<point_ID_type> const& points, std::vector<coord_type> const& coords, F f) :
98  _matrix( make_matrix(coords, f) ),
99  _points(points),
100  _coords(coords)
101  {}
102 
103  // interface with mass-based demographic history expand method
104  auto arrival_space(coord_type const& x) const {
105  auto it = m_arrival_space_cash.find(x);
106  if(it != m_arrival_space_cash.end())
107  {
108  return it->second;
109  }else{
110  auto p = m_arrival_space_cash.emplace(x, retrieve_non_zero_arrival_space(x));
111  return p.first->second;
112  }
113  }
114 
115  auto retrieve_non_zero_arrival_space(coord_type const& x) const {
116  using it1_t = typename matrix_type::const_iterator1;
117  using it2_t = typename matrix_type::const_iterator2;
118  auto i = quetzal::utils::getIndexOfPointInVector(x, _coords);
119  it1_t it1 = _matrix.begin1();
120  std::advance(it1, i);
121  std::vector<coord_type> v;
122  v.reserve(_matrix.size2()); // worst case
123  for (it2_t it2 = it1.begin(); it2 != it1.end(); it2++) {
124  if(*it2 > 0.0) v.push_back(_coords.at(it2.index2()));
125  }
126  return v;
127  }
128 
129  // interface with mass-based demographic history expand method
130  double migration_rate(coord_type const& x, coord_type const& y){
131  return _matrix(quetzal::utils::getIndexOfPointInVector(x, _coords), quetzal::utils::getIndexOfPointInVector(y, _coords) );
132  }
133 
134  }; // inner class Implementation
135 
136  // Cheap copy interfacing the implementation with the demographic simulation
137  template<typename Space, typename Matrix>
138  class Interface {
139 
140  using impl_type = Implementation<Space, Matrix>;
141  using coord_type = Space;
142  using point_ID_type = quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>;
143  std::shared_ptr<impl_type> m_pimpl;
144 
145  public:
146 
147  // Constructor invoked by helper functions
148  template<typename F>
149  Interface(std::vector<point_ID_type> const& points, std::vector<coord_type> const& coords, F f):
150  m_pimpl(std::make_shared<impl_type>(points, coords, f) ) {}
151 
152  // migration rate interface in the demographic algorithm
153  double operator()(coord_type const& x, coord_type const& y){
154  return m_pimpl->migration_rate(x,y);
155  }
156 
157  // part of the interface in the demographic algorithm
158  auto arrival_space(coord_type const& x) const {
159  return m_pimpl->arrival_space(x);
160  }
161  }; // inner class Interface
162 
163  public:
164 
166  using value_type = unsigned int;
167 
176  template<typename T, typename F>
177  static auto make_distance_based_dispersal(std::vector<T> const& coords, F f)
178  {
179  using coord_type = T;
180  std::vector<quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>> points;
181  points.reserve(coords.size());
182  const auto& ref = coords;
183  std::transform(coords.begin(), coords.end(), std::back_inserter(points),
184  [ref](coord_type const& x){ return quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>(ref, x); });
185  using matrix_type = boost::numeric::ublas::symmetric_matrix<double>;
186  return Interface<coord_type, matrix_type>(points, coords, f);
187  }
188 
200  template<typename T, typename F>
201  static auto make_sparse_distance_based_dispersal(std::vector<T> const& coords, F f){
202  using coord_type = T;
203  std::vector<quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>> points;
204  points.reserve(coords.size());
205  const auto& ref = coords;
206  std::transform(coords.begin(), coords.end(), std::back_inserter(points),
207  [ref](coord_type const& x){ return quetzal::utils::PointWithId<coord_type>(ref, x); });
208  using matrix_type = boost::numeric::ublas::compressed_matrix<double>;
209  return Interface<coord_type, matrix_type>(points, coords, f);
210  }
211 
212  };
213 
214 } // namespace strategy

216 } //namespace demography
217 
218 } // namespace quetzal
